name: ss_respawn_01
text: Ah, that first breath is the sweetest.

name: ss_respawn_05
text: Well, I've caught my breath...back to it!

name: ss_respawn_07
text: In the eye of the storm...

name: ss_rare_02
text: I'll scatter my foes like dead leaves in a winter gale!
text_simple: ill scatter my foes like dead leaves in a winter gale

name: ss_rare_03
text: Everyone complains about the weather...well, I'm doing something about it!
text_simple: everyone complains about the weather well im doing something about it

name: ss_rare_04
text: When a warm front and a cold front love each other very much...a storm is born!
text_simple: when a warm front and a cold front love each other very much a storm is born

name: ss_rare_05
text: I only want blue tangos in my dressing room!

name: stormspirit_scepter_02
text: With this I'll be king of the winds.
text_simple: with this ill be king of the winds

name: stormspirit_rival_01
text: There's no safe harbor from this storm, Kunkka!
text_simple: theres no safe harbor from this storm kunkka

name: stormspirit_rival_02
text: Ha ha! You should have put to port sooner!
text_simple: ha ha you should have put to port sooner

name: stormspirit_rival_03
text: Admiral, but not admirable. Hm hm hm hm.
text_simple: admiral but not admirable hm hm hm hm

name: stormspirit_rival_04
text: Call off your little storms, Razor. They're an embarrassment.
text_simple: call off your little storms razor theyre an embarrassment

name: stormspirit_rival_05
text: You can come out of that tin can any time.
text_simple: you can come out of that tin can any time

name: stormspirit_rival_06
text: If you think to harness nature's power, you've got another think coming.
text_simple: if you think to harness natures power youve got another think coming

name: stormspirit_rival_07
text: The biggest tree in the forest must bow to the smallest storm.
text_simple: the biggest tree in the forest must bow to the smallest storm

name: stormspirit_rival_09
text: When you strip away his leaves, Nature's Prophet is just plain gnarly.
text_simple: when you strip away his leaves natures prophet is just plain gnarly

name: stormspirit_rival_10
text: Ha ha! Blew you off course, did I?
text_simple: ha ha blew you off course did i

name: stormspirit_rival_11
text: Your whirlybird is at the mercy of the wind, and I'm not feeling very merciful today.
text_simple: your whirlybird is at the mercy of the wind and im not feeling very merciful today

name: stormspirit_rival_12
text: You needed an altitude adjustment, hm hm.
text_simple: you needed an altitude adjustment hm hm

name: stormspirit_rival_13
text: You shouldn't have spit into the wind, Viper.
text_simple: you shouldnt have spit into the wind viper

name: stormspirit_rival_14
text: Ha ha ha ha. Your maidenly charms were wasted on me.
text_simple: ha ha ha ha your maidenly charms were wasted on me

name: stormspirit_rival_15
text: Venomancer, I was never a fan.
text_simple: venomancer i was never a fan

name: stormspirit_rival_16
text: Anti-Mage, you're no fun at all.
text_simple: antimage youre no fun at all

name: stormspirit_rival_18
text: That grimoire of his got terrible reviews.
text_simple: that grimoire of his got terrible reviews

name: stormspirit_rival_19
text_simple: mm spirit apparition theyre nothing alike

name: stormspirit_rival_20
text: Pity, Puck. You lightened the air.
text_simple: pity puck you lightened the air

name: stormspirit_rival_21
text: I leave you with your precious dirt.
text_simple: i leave you with your precious dirt

name: stormspirit_rival_22
text: You weren't particularly bright or enduring.
text_simple: you werent particularly bright or enduring

name: stormspirit_rival_23
text: Your calculations cannot predict the movements of the storm!
text_simple: your calculations cannot predict the movements of the storm

name: stormspirit_rival_24
text: I've lived on this plane much longer, brother. You have no power here.
text_simple: ive lived on this plane much longer brother you have no power here

name: stormspirit_ally_01
text: Did you truly come here of your own accord?
text_simple: did you truly come here of your own accord
pretty_criteria: Void Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: stormspirit_ally_02
text: Have you ever considered what five words could do for you?
text_simple: have you ever considered what five words could do for you
pretty_criteria: Ember Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: stormspirit_ally_03
text: I'll forgive your scheming, but never your entitlement.
text_simple: ill forgive your scheming but never your entitlement
pretty_criteria: Void Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: stormspirit_ally_04
text: You were supposed to oversee...from a distance.
text_simple: you were supposed to oversee from a distance
pretty_criteria: Void Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: stormspirit_ally_05
text: You cannot control me, brother. You merely set me loose.
text_simple: you cannot control me brother you merely set me loose
pretty_criteria: Void Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in (30% chance)

name: stormspirit_levelup_01
text: Was that a spotlight? On me?
text_simple: was that a spotlight on me

name: stormspirit_levelup_03
text: Such greatness deserves to be shared.
text_simple: such greatness deserves to be shared

name: stormspirit_levelup_05
text: Don't worry, there's plenty to go around.
text_simple: dont worry theres plenty to go around

name: stormspirit_levelup_06
text: Let's have the spotlight. Over here!
text_simple: lets have the spotlight over here

name: stormspirit_firstblood_01
text: I accept this honor on behalf of storms everywhere!
text_simple: i accept this honor on behalf of storms everywhere

name: stormspirit_blink_02
text: The eye of the storm blinks!
text_simple: the eye of the storm blinks

name: stormspirit_battlebegins_01
text: You had better not start without me!
text_simple: you had better not start without me

name: stormspirit_battlebegins_02
text: Draw back the curtains, I'm here!
